schema.description: 开通服务的计费类型。取值为**PayByTraffic**，表示按流量计费。

400.errorMessage: The specified value of parameter InternetChargeType is not valid.
Your account does not have enough balance.
The input parameter OwnerId or OwnerAccount that is mandatory for processing this request is not supplied.

403.errorMessage: User not authorized to open Intl service.
Bid user is limited to open service.

title: 开通CDN服务
summary: 调用OpenCdnService开通CDN服务。开通服务后才能进行域名操作。
description:
- 一个用户只能开通一次，且要求阿里云账号已通过实名认证。
- 单用户调用频率：5次/秒。
